author: boudoul
body:
As requested by upgrade managers, I created a new scenario which corresponds to the usual HGCAL (V5 with Pandora reconstruction) in which I removed the tracker pixel extension. I'm still testing it to be sure to validate locally my config. A set of relvals will be requested once fully integrate in a release.
It can be tested with the workflow 162XX.
(a similar one with Shashlik is already available for some time, 134XX)
title: New scenario without  Pixel Extension (phase2, HGCAL version of the calorimeter)
